attributes.title: almost died!!
attributes.review: opened up the app to show my support for the orange but when i did the app kept glitching and the oranges face was so bright i almost couldn’t see!! my eyes are still burning! protest yourselves and ur families and do NOT download this app!

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: So let’s start off with how BAD this was glitching. An orange face kept popping up and it was so annoying😡then all I wanted was to have a wonderful app that makes America great again but I guess not🙄 I suggest to take this app off the App Store ASAP!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: When I opened the app it hacked my phone and I was so sad bc I had to get a new phone which is the worst I want this app to be off the App Store as soon as possible plzz and There’s rlly no point of having the app it makes no sense

attributes.title: Below par
attributes.review: I mean, playing plague inc was fun and all until I tried it on easy mode and the disease invaded America way to fast. Way to easy to win, would’ve thought it would be more challenging.... maybe next update?

attributes.title: Terrible.
attributes.review: I am a grown woman in the great country of America and I can say with confidence that this is the WORST app I've ever seen! This app broke my ipad. It has bugs and completely destroyed my software! I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP. Our great president has failed us with this technology! I am DISAPPOINTED.
